items.title: Netflix gets price target increases from several Wall Street shops after earnings beat
items.description: Several analysts raised their price target on Netflix after its first-quarter earnings beat.

items.title: Tesla gets a price target cut from Barclays ahead of earnings this week
items.description: "The set-up for Tesla into 1Q EPS is confusing," said analyst Dan Levy.

items.title: Bernstein predicts which Chinese stocks can survive delisting and tariff worries
items.description: Bernstein is looking at Chinese internet tech stocks like it's the downtrodden days of Covid-19.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts like these dividend-paying energy stocks
items.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Energy Transfer and Diamondback Energy.

items.title: Tariff negotiations may bring unseen risks to individual stocks
items.description: Nvidia's drop last week is an example of how the still-developing trade situation can deliver bad news for key stocks.
